QuestData.Title: A Day in the Life
QuestData.Description:
A Bearer's duty is to carry souls through the veil to Oribos, where they shall be judged and passed along to one of the realms of the Shadowlands.
This soul is ready to move on.
During this trial, you will experience his final moments before his death.
When you are prepared, you shall see how this soul passed.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Sarah Howell in Lakeshire.
